snippet: Hotel rewards programs are not all alike. Some erase points if an account shows no activity in a year, while other programs’ points never expire.
abstract: Overview of hotel rewards programs finds not all are alike; notes some erase points if an account shows no activity in a year, while other programs' points never expire.
lead_paragraph: Hotel rewards programs are not all alike. Some erase points if an account shows no activity in a year, while other programs’ points never expire.
